lessons.title: Welcome to Your Learning Journey
lessons.content: Welcome to SkillPath! This is your personal learning platform where you can master new skills at your own pace. Each course is designed to be interactive, engaging, and practical. You'll learn through short lessons, take quizzes to test your knowledge, and track your progress as you go.

lessons.title: How Lessons Work
lessons.content: Each lesson contains a short explanation of a concept, followed by a simple quiz to help you remember what you learned. Don't worry about getting answers wrong - the goal is to learn! You can take the quiz as many times as you need, and your progress is automatically saved.

lessons.title: Understanding Progress
lessons.content: Your progress is tracked automatically as you complete lessons. You'll see a progress bar at the top of each course showing how much you've completed. The more lessons you finish, the higher your progress percentage will be. This helps you stay motivated and see your learning journey.

quiz.question: How is your progress tracked?
options: You have to track it manually
Only your teacher can see it

lessons.title: Taking Quizzes
lessons.content: Quizzes are designed to be helpful, not stressful! Each quiz has multiple choice questions with clear options. You'll get immediate feedback on your answers, and you can review the correct answers if you make mistakes. Remember, learning is about understanding, not perfection.

quiz.question: What should you do if you get a quiz answer wrong?
options: Review the correct answer and learn from it

lessons.title: Your Learning Dashboard
lessons.content: Your personal dashboard shows all your courses, progress, and achievements. You can add courses to your collection, track your learning statistics, and see how much time you've spent learning. It's your central hub for managing your learning journey.

quiz.question: Where can you see all your courses and progress?

lessons.title: Wallet Connection
lessons.content: SkillPath uses blockchain technology to securely save your progress. When you connect your wallet, your learning data is saved specifically to your wallet address. This means your progress is private, secure, and accessible from any device when you connect the same wallet.

quiz.question: Why do you need to connect a wallet?

lessons.title: Course Navigation
lessons.content: Courses are organized into parts, and each part contains several lessons. You can navigate between parts using the buttons at the top. Some parts may be locked until you complete previous ones. This helps ensure you build a strong foundation before moving to advanced topics.

lessons.title: Getting Help
lessons.content: If you ever get stuck or have questions, don't hesitate to ask for help! The platform is designed to be user-friendly, but learning new things can sometimes be challenging. Take your time, review lessons if needed, and remember that everyone learns at their own pace.

quiz.question: What should you do if you get stuck?
options: Ask for help and take your time

lessons.title: Setting Learning Goals
lessons.content: Setting small, achievable goals can help you stay motivated. Maybe you want to complete one lesson per day, or finish a course within a week. Whatever your goal, remember that consistent small steps lead to big achievements. Celebrate your progress along the way!

quiz.question: What's a good approach to learning goals?

lessons.title: You're Ready to Start!
lessons.content: Congratulations! You've completed the initiation course and learned the basics of how SkillPath works. You now understand how to navigate lessons, take quizzes, track your progress, and use your dashboard. You're ready to explore other courses and start your learning journey!

options: How to use the SkillPath platform
